How many people are affected by Lennox-Gastaut syndrome ?,"Lennox-Gastaut syndrome affects an estimated 1 in 50,000 to 1 in 100,000 children. This condition accounts for about 4 percent of all cases of childhood epilepsy. For unknown reasons, it appears to be more common in males than in females.",GHR,Lennox-Gastaut syndrome
